items.title: Deal of the day: Book nonstop lie-flat seats to Paris or Amsterdam for just 38,000 Capital One miles
items.description: Combine great partner redemption rates and a generous transfer bonus to fly to Paris or Amsterdam in comfort for less.

items.title: Ouch: Hilton Honors devaluation sees award redemptions skyrocket up to 250,000 points per night
items.description: A major Hilton Honors devaluation has award nights costing more.

items.title: How to maximize earning with the Chase Sapphire Reserve
items.description: It's easy to rack up points with the Chase Sapphire Reserve after earning the valuable on-time welcome offer by maximizing the card's ongoing benefits...

items.title: United Airlines and Italy's ITA Airways to start loyalty partnership ahead of Star Alliance move
items.description: United Airlines and Italy's ITA Airways will begin a codeshare and loyalty tie-up Sept. 15.

items.title: Alaska Airlines airport lounges: How to get access to this VIP space
items.description: Learn how to access Alaska Airlines lounges in 2025, including by paying for a membership and having the right credit card.
